	trait = fickle
	trait = pensive

		birth = yes
		add_character_flag = canon_status_canon
	}
	6629.1.1 = { trait = knight }
	6660.1.1 = { death = yes }
}

Tully_44 = {

	mother = Blackwood_59

	trait = intellect_good_1
	trait = brave
	trait = diligent
	trait = authoritative
	trait = charming

	disallow_random_traits = yes

	8112.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		add_character_flag = canon_status_canon
	}
	8126.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			agot_safe_crush_history_effect = {
				TARGET = character:Hogg_23 # Bonnie Hogg, AKA: Miss Piggy
			}
			agot_safe_betrothal_history_effect = {
				TARGET = character:Hogg_23 # Bonnie Hogg, AKA: Miss Piggy
			}
		}
	}
	8128.1.1 = { trait = knight }
	8131.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { character:Tully_46 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Tully_46 # Oscar Tully
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Blackwood_74 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Blackwood_74 # Benjicot Blackwood
			}
		}
	}
	8133.1.1 = { add_spouse = Vance_Wayfarers_Rest_31 } # Tinessa Vance
	8170.1.1 = { death = yes }
}

Tully_46 = {
	name = Oscar # Canon
	dynasty = dynn_Tully

	martial = 10
	prowess = 6

	religion = the_seven_main
	culture = riverlander

	father = Tully_39
	mother = Blackwood_59

	trait = education_martial_3
	trait = charming

	disallow_random_traits = yes

	8115.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		add_character_flag = canon_status_canon
	}
	8131.1.1 = {
		trait = knight
		trait = brave
		trait = just
		effect = {
			add_trait = compassionate
			add_trait = content
			if = {
				limit = { character:Blackwood_74 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Blackwood_74 # Benjicot Blackwood
			}
		}
	}
	8134.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			remove_trait = compassionate
			remove_trait = content
		}
		add_trait = callous
		trait = wrathful
		trait = organizer
	}
	# 8134.2.1 = { give_nickname = nick_the_grouch }
	8168.1.1 = { death = yes }
}

Mooton_27 = {
	name = Jonah # Canon, a lord, friend of princess Saera
	dynasty = dynn_Mooton

	dna = Mooton_27

	prowess = 6

	religion = the_seven_main
	culture = riverlander

	father = Mooton_26

	trait = gregarious
	trait = just

	8067.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		add_character_flag = has_scripted_appearance
		add_character_flag = canon_status_canon
	}
	8077.1.1 = {
		effect = { agot_handle_knightless_squire_history_effect = yes }
	}
	8082.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			agot_safe_lover_history_effect = {
				TARGET = character:Moore_24 # Perianne Moore
			}
			agot_safe_lover_history_effect = {
				TARGET = character:Turnberry_18 # Alys Turnberry
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Moore_24 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Moore_24 # Perianne Moore
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Turnberry_18 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Turnberry_18 # Alys Turnberry
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Beesbury_22 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Beesbury_22 # Braxton Beesbury
			}
			if = {
				limit = { character:Connington_27 = { is_alive = yes } }
				set_relation_friend = character:Connington_27 # Roy Connington
			}
		}
	}
	8084.1.1 = {
		trait = knight
		add_spouse = Moore_24 # Perianne Moore
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { character:Turnberry_18 = { is_alive = yes } }
				remove_relation_lover = character:Turnberry_18 # Alys Turnberry
			}
		}
	}
	8121.1.1 = { death = yes }
}

###### HOUSE NUTT (id = dynn_Nutt)
############################
